overall_summary: ElizaOS is preparing for a significant token migration from AI16Z to ElizaOS on November 7th with a 1:6 conversion ratio, while development continues on key features including x402 middleware, dynamic prompt execution, and entity-level security.

new_issues_prs.title: feat: x402 middleware
new_issues_prs.author: odilitime
new_issues_prs.significance: Introduces payment protection for plugin routes, adding core payment types and verification functionality

new_issues_prs.title: feat: Framework for adjusting prompts to best fix model contexts
new_issues_prs.author: odilitime
new_issues_prs.significance: Introduces schema-based dynamic prompt execution system to improve model context handling

new_issues_prs.title: Support Tasks
new_issues_prs.author: borisudovicic
new_issues_prs.significance: Collaboration on anonymous ID and free inference architecture

new_issues_prs.title: Voice Infrastructure
new_issues_prs.author: borisudovicic
new_issues_prs.significance: Testing browser-based voice generation and preparing server voice endpoints

new_issues_prs.title: Plugin-Cloud Testing
new_issues_prs.author: borisudovicic
new_issues_prs.significance: Testing plugin-cloud integration with Eliza Framework

overall_focus.claim: Development is focused on enhancing core infrastructure with x402 payment middleware, schema-based prompt execution, and entity-level row-level security, while preparing documentation and voice capabilities.

discord_updates.summary: Extensive discussions about the upcoming AI16Z to ElizaOS token migration on November 7th with a 1:6 conversion ratio and a 90-day migration window. Users concerned about exchange support and migration procedures for wallet holders.
Technical discussions about Puppeteer/Playwright for headless hardware-accelerated video encoding in containers, with suggestions to use Nia with MCP for documentation indexing.
Debate about storing x402 payment configurations in project initialization vs. character files, with consensus that character files can have personal wallets with configurations.

user_feedback.feedback_summary: Users reported issues with ElizaOS mirror.xyz sites not working properly ahead of the token migration.
Concerns raised about high APY (35%) on USDC in a related protocol, with warnings about systemic risk exposure to XUSD.

strategic_insights.insight: The upcoming 1:6 token migration on November 7th represents a critical transition for the project that requires careful communication and support for users across different exchange and wallet types.
implications_or_questions: How well is the team prepared to support users during the 90-day migration window?
What contingency plans exist if certain exchanges do not support automatic migration?

strategic_insights.insight: Development of x402 payment middleware and character-level wallet configurations suggests a strategic move to create a robust economic layer within the ElizaOS ecosystem.
implications_or_questions: How will these payment features affect agent adoption and monetization?
What are the security implications of character-specific wallet configurations?

strategic_insights.insight: The mention of Moca launching 10k Eliza agents indicates significant ecosystem expansion while the dynamic prompt execution framework shows focus on improving agent performance across varying model context sizes.
implications_or_questions: How will the platform scale to support thousands of new agents?
Will the new prompt framework improve reliability across different model providers?

market_analysis.observation: Discussions around token migration have users debating whether to buy more AI16Z before migration or wait, suggesting market speculation opportunities.
market_analysis.relevance: Pre-migration trading decisions could impact token price and liquidity leading up to and immediately following the migration.

market_analysis.observation: Lighter (perps dex) will not support AI16Z after migration, with listing of ElizaOS tokens at their discretion.
market_analysis.relevance: Exchange support is critical for maintaining liquidity and accessibility of the new token after migration.

token_migration.detail: AI16Z tokens will migrate to ElizaOS tokens on November 7th with a 1:6 conversion ratio (1 AI16Z = 6 ElizaOS).
token_migration.notes: Users will have a 90-day window to complete manual migrations.

token_migration.detail: Exchanges will handle automatic migrations for users who don't hold their own keys.
token_migration.notes: Official information about which exchanges support automatic migration will be shared on Friday.
